MACROS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Macros

Macros are like magic spells. With just one click, you can execute a series of predefined actions, such as labeling a conversation, sending an email transcript, or updating custom attributes. This streamlines workflows, boosts productivity, and ensures consistency in actions.

Plus, macros can be a lifesaver when onboarding new team members. Instead of explaining each step, managers and team leads can simply point to the macros used in different scenarios, saving time and effort.

You can manage your macros from this page or create new ones using the 'Add macro' button.

Open the Macros handbook in another tab for a helping hand.
MACROS.ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
MACROS.ORDER_INFO: Arrange your macro actions in the order you want them to be executed. Simply drag and drop the actions into the desired order using the handle beside each node.

GLOBAL.LABEL: Public
GLOBAL.DESCRIPTION: Make the macro accessible to all agents in this account.

PERSONAL.LABEL: Private
PERSONAL.DESCRIPTION: Make the macro private for your use only, and not visible to other agents.
